divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were sitting in the backyard when i looked up i saw the first of three lights from behind a tree when i pointed it out to my wife the were three red\orange pulsing lights in a triange silently moving in a line from northwest to southeast ad continued on that past until we could not see it any more
Summary: slow moving lights in the shape of a triangle
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Derry
There were 2 other sightings in Derry on or around June 30th 2012
